dialogue.start: We have placed a bounty on Bruiseclaw and his pack of gnolls for acts of raiding. Slaughter them and bring me their paws, and the expedition here will reward you well.
dialogue.active: Bring me their paws, and we'll reward you well.
dialogue.completed: You have the paws? Great! Chapman was worried about the gnoll situation, and I'll like to tell him that we got it under control thanks to your efforts.
dialogue.delivered: The gnoll situation has calmed down ever since you took care of them. That'll teach them to leave us alone now.
